verses.verse: Yahweh, <WH3068> you are my God. <WH430> I will exalt <WH7311> you! <WH3034> I will praise your name, <WH8034> for you have done <WH6213> wonderful <WH6382> things, <WH6098> things planned long ago, <WH7350> in complete faithfulness <WH530> and truth. <WH544>

For you have made <WH7760> a city <WH5892> into a heap, <WH1530> a fortified <WH1219> city <WH7151> into a ruin, <WH4654> a palace <WH759> of strangers <WH2114> to be no city. <WH5892> It will never <WH5769> be built. <WH1129>
Therefore a strong <WH5794> people <WH5971> will glorify <WH3513> you. <WH7151> A city of awesome <WH6184> nations <WH1471> will fear you. <WH3372>

For you have been a stronghold <WH4581> to the poor, <WH1800> a stronghold <WH4581> to the needy <WH34> in his distress, <WH6862> a refuge <WH4268> from the storm, <WH2230> a shade <WH6738> from the heat, <WH2721> when the blast <WH7307> of the dreaded ones <WH6184> is like a storm <WH2230> against the wall. <WH7023>

As the heat <WH2721> in a dry place <WH6724> will you bring down <WH3665> the noise <WH7588> of strangers; <WH2114> as the heat <WH2721> by the shade <WH6738> of a cloud, <WH5645> the song <WH2159> of the dreaded ones <WH6184> will be brought low. <WH6030>

In this mountain, <WH2022> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies <WH6635> will make <WH6213> all peoples <WH5971> a feast <WH4960> of fat things, <WH8081> a feast <WH4960> of choice wines, <WH8105> of fat things <WH8081> full of marrow, <WH4229> of well refined <WH2212> choice wines. <WH8105>

He will destroy <WH1104> in this mountain <WH2022> the surface <WH6440> of the covering <WH3875> that covers <WH3874> all peoples, <WH5971> and the veil <WH4541> that is spread <WH5259> over all nations. <WH1471>

He has swallowed up <WH1104> death <WH4194> forever! <WH5331> The Lord <WH136> Yahweh <WH3069> will wipe away <WH4229> tears <WH1832> from off all faces. <WH6440> He will take the reproach <WH2781> of his people <WH5971> away <WH5493> from off all the earth, <WH776> for Yahweh <WH3068> has spoken it. <WH1696>

It shall be said <WH559> in that day, <WH3117> "Behold, <WH430> this is our God! We have waited <WH6960> for him, <WH3467> and he will save us! <WH3068> This is Yahweh! We have waited <WH6960> for him. <WH1523> We will be glad and rejoice <WH8055> in his salvation! <WH3444>"

For in this mountain <WH2022> the hand <WH3027> of Yahweh <WH3068> will rest. <WH5117> Moab <WH4124> will be trodden down <WH1758> in his place, <WH4963> even like straw is trodden down <WH1758> in the water of the dunghill. <WH4087>

He will spread out <WH6566> his hands <WH3027> in its midst, <WH7130> like one who swims <WH7811> spreads out <WH6566> hands to swim, <WH7811> but his pride <WH1346> will be humbled <WH8213> together with the craft <WH698> of his hands. <WH3027>
He has brought the high <WH4869> fortress <WH4013> of your walls <WH2346> down, <WH7817> laid low, <WH8213> and brought <WH5060> to the ground, <WH776> even to the dust. <WH6083>
